import React from 'react'; import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom'; import './Complex.css'; import img from '../../assets/img/photo.jpg'; function Complex(){ window.scroll(0, 0); function setupStandartPrice( price ){ return Number(price).toLocaleString(); } const { id } = useParams(); const [error, setError] = React.useState(null); const [isLoaded, setIsLoaded] = React.useState(false); const [bath, setBath] = React.useState([]); const [services, setServices] = React.useState([]); // const [category, setCategory] = React.useState([]); React.useEffect(() => { fetch("http://45.135.164.103:8080/api/bath/"+id) .then(res => res.json()) .then( (result) => { setIsLoaded(true); setBath(result.bath); setServices(result.services); }, (error) => { setIsLoaded(true); setError(error); } ) // fetch("http://45.135.164.103:8080/api/category") // .then(res => res.json()) // .then( // (result) => { // setIsLoaded(true); // setCategory(result[bath.category_id]); // }, // (error) => { // setIsLoaded(true); // setError(error); // } // ) }, []); // console.log(category); return (
